Photo Mode for BG3 will also allow players to set the scene. Toggle on and off to remove NPCs, Enemies, your party, and even yourself! Apart from that, players will be delighted to choose facial expressions, plus a range of over 40 static and animated poses, each with multiple variations to help give you the perfect layout.
